panels.description:
The last measured power draw for the entire board, in watts. Only available if power management is supported.
This reading is accurate to within +/- 5 watts.
Requires Inforom PWR object version 3.0 or higher or  Kepler device.
panels.title: GPU Power Draw (Avg)

panels.description: Core GPU temperature. For all discrete and S-class products.
panels.title: GPU Temperature (Avg)

panels.description: Total errors detected across entire chip. Sum of Device  Memory, Register File, L1 Cache, L2 Cache and Texture Memory
panels.title: ECC Errors
